    x=(i.replace('Age ',''))

        mi,mx=x.split('-')
        mi,mx=int(mi),int(mx)
        minn.append(mi)
        ma.append(int(mx))
    else:
        if x.split('+')[0].isdigit():
            minn.append(int(x.split('+')[0]))

        ma.append(15)
data['Minimum Age']=minn
